project.description: Test a pull request for a given branch

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Build and install HEAD for the integration tests rm -rf $DEV_TOOLS_REPO $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO
git clone git@github.com:openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_REPO}.git pushd ${DEV_TOOLS_REPO} git checkout $BRANCH popd git clone git@github.com:openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO}.git pushd ${DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO} git checkout $BRANCH build/devenv clone_addtl_repos $BRANCH --replace popd
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" ]; then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO}/pull/$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO fi
if [ -n "$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" ]; then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${ORIGIN_SERVER_REPO}/pull/$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID --repo $ORIGIN_SERVER_REPO fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ]; then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${RHC_REPO}/pull/$RHC_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo $RHC_REPO fi
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" ]; then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_REPO}/pull/$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_REPO fi
set +x echo "
" set -x
pushd $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO build/devenv launch test_pull_requests_generic_${BUILD_NUMBER} --verifier --branch $BRANCH build/devenv sync test_pull_requests_generic_${BUILD_NUMBER} --tag --clean_metadata
# Run the tests build/devenv test test_pull_requests_generic_${BUILD_NUMBER} --terminate popd
